    | text      = to guess a human name.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:04.240
    | text      = Yeah, of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:05.240
    | text      = Dan, I don't see how that does not make perfect sense to you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:10.240
    | text      = That's bewilderingly racist. That's so crazy. Because, like, I do mean this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:17.240
    | text      = Joanne seems like a sweet lady. She seems fine. But, like, she's a 50-year-old, maybe,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:26.240
    | text      = old white lady.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:27.240
    | text      = Of course. Yeah, there is no doubt about that in my mind.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:30.240
    | text      = Who lived for a lot of her life in, you know, the Bay Area of California, up north.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:37.240
    | text      = Right. No shortage of fun things to believe out there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:40.240
    | text      = Yeah, but also she doesn't know about, like, what is or is not a different culture's name.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:45.240
    | text      = You know, like, she doesn't know all the naming traditions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:47.240
    | text      = Well, that's why she asks Mark.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:48.240
    | text      = And he's like, yep, raptors.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:50.240
    | text      = Raptors.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:51.240
    | text      = Definitely raptors.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:52.240
    | text      = I think that's a fun racism, though. Like, she doesn't get how incredibly racist that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:57.240
    | text      = is and how insensitive and stupid it is. But at the same time, it's better than thinking
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:02.240
    | text      = that all other names are dumb. It's more like, oh, silly raptors.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:06.240
    | text      = Isn't that cute? The raptors think...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:08.240
    | text      = Trying to make human names.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:09.240
    | text      = They think they're pulling one on us.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:10.240
    | text      = Yeah, like, wait, lady, do you mean any name that isn't a white person's name? Is that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:15.240
    | text      = basically what she's saying?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:16.240
    | text      = Well, she said that you could see some in their Malaysian names, but some of them, too
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:20.240
    | text      = silly. It's crazy. But, uh...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:23.240
    | text      = That's such a complex...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:25.240
    | text      = So, it is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:26.240
    | text      = Venn diagram of knowing what a Malaysian name is and at the same time...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:32.240
    | text      = What is a...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:33.240
    | text      = ...thinking a raptor made it out. Fantastic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:36.240
    | text      = So, Carrie is not a great interviewer. We know this. She just agrees with everything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:41.240
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:42.240
    | text      = But at this point in the interview, she does come up with at least a question. And she
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:48.240
    | text      = does ask if she's ever seen a raptor.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:51.240
    | text      = That's a good question.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:52.240
    | text      = It seems like probably...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:53.240
    | text      = It seems like question number one, but I'm just glad she got there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:56.240
    | text      = Yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:57.240
    | text      = So, in terms of the, you know, the interaction with the raptors, have you ever seen a raptor?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:04.240
    | text      = Because he talks about they're going to be on tour here in this...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:08.240
    | text      = I don't know if it's called Jurassic World or what it's called.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:12.240
    | text      = It's T-Rex World.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:14.240
    | text      = Oh, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:15.240
    | text      = And I don't know if they're actively hiding themselves among the models or whatever, but
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:22.240
    | text      = there are certainly raptors in that show. And then, I think they were involved with
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:29.240
    | text      = a couple of years back. They were in another big production. And it might have been like
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:36.240
    | text      = walking dinosaurs or whatever, but it was... I went and saw it like it used to be called
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:42.240
    | text      = the Arco Arena up in Sacramento. I don't know if it's still called that, but it was cool.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:48.240
    | text      = It was like going through history, the dinosaur history through the ages. And it was fascinating,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:55.240
    | text      = but I kept thinking that, you know, there would actually be some raptors in the raptor
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:01.240
    | text      = suits, but I think they might have been nearby.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:04.240
    | text      = So, I want to pause there for a second.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:05.240
    | text      = Wait, wait, wait. She thought there would be raptors within raptor suits.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:09.240
    | text      = Yes, yes. After walking with the dinosaurs.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:13.240
    | text      = So, the raptors are hiding in plain sight by dressing up as raptors.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:21.240
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:22.240
    | text      = Because you would never suspect a dressed up raptor to have a raptor inside of it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:29.240
    | text      = Never, never.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:31.240
    | text      = But she says this like she knew there weren't any there. And she's like, wait, well, they're
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:36.240
    | text      = probably nearby.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:37.240
    | text      = Well, you know what I love?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:38.240
    | text      = Because they want to be close to their people?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:40.240
    | text      = Fake versions of their people?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:41.240
    | text      = Yeah, what's going on there?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:42.240
    | text      = Here's what I love. I love the visual that this gives me that is Joanne going to walking
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:47.240
    | text      = with the dinosaurs and like seeing a raptor suit and giving it a knowing nod.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:54.240
    | text      = I know you can't move and show all your cards, but I see you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:59.240
    | text      = See, I have the visual of a raptor trying to put on a raptor suit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:04.240
    | text      = That would be tough.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:05.240
    | text      = That would be so hard. I would admit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:08.240
    | text      = Let me be clear, too. They do discuss it. We're not misrepresenting what raptors are.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:14.240
    | text      = They are like velociraptors.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:16.240
    | text      = The raptors that you and I are thinking of.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:18.240
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:19.240
    | text      = OK, good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:20.240
    | text      = But maybe a tiny bit smaller.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:21.240
    | text      = So do they use their little hands to zip it up?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:24.240
    | text      = Yes, and some of them get surgeries so they can speak like humans.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:27.240
    | text      = Oh, OK. Well, that's good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:28.240
    | text      = That's important.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:29.240
    | text      = That's good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:30.240
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:31.240
    | text      = Well, then you'd think they would be better at picking human names then.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:34.240
    | text      = Also, when walking with the dinosaurs came around, like when it was big a few years back,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:39.240
    | text      = I was working at Groupon at the time, and we ran a Groupon for it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:43.240
    | text      = And the sales rep that worked out that deal got them to come to our office.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:46.240
    | text      = Oh, that's cool.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:47.240
    | text      = It was pretty cool, but at the same time, I mean, it was fucking terrifying.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:51.240
    | text      = Did you see a raptor?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:52.240
    | text      = I might have. No, I didn't.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:54.240
    | text      = I saw a bunch of people manipulating a puppet, like outside of the suit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:59.240
    | text      = OK.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:00.240
    | text      = They weren't inside it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:01.240
    | text      = Were they? Now this... I'm just spitballing here, Dave.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:05.240
    | text      = I'm listening.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:06.240
    | text      = Were they raptors in human suits?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:10.240
    | text      = Well, see, that could be possible, because they do discuss at a certain point that some of the elite raptors don't have tails.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:19.240
    | text      = But...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:20.240
    | text      = I don't care.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:21.240
    | text      = That makes perfect. That makes enough sense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:22.240
    | text      = I don't care.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:23.240
    | text      = That makes enough sense. Why? Why not?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:24.240
    | text      = Let's get back to this clip.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:25.240
    | text      = Why not?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:26.240
    | text      = Let's get back to this clip, because she has some more... Joanna...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:29.240
    | text      = Oh, raptors in raptor suits.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:31.240
    | text      = Joanna still has more thoughts about seeing raptors.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:35.240
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:36.240
    | text      = And the possibility of such a thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:38.240
    | text      = Well, I couldn't tell that they were actually in the actor's suit that day, but I think they were probably hanging out nearby.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:45.240
    | text      = So you just never know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:47.240
    | text      = We're in Jurassic World, in some of the running scenes and stuff.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:52.240
    | text      = Again, we have these treaties where there's not supposed to be open communication with civilians, so they really try not to be seen by people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:04.240
    | text      = But they do like to go to big conferences, or big Comic-Con type of conferences, where a lot of people are in costumes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:16.239
    | text      = And a lot of different aliens do that. They'll either wear a hooded outfit...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:20.239
    | text      = A lot of different aliens? There's a lot of aliens now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:22.239
    | text      = ...or maybe if they do, and they're tall, they just look like they fit in.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:24.239
    | text      = This is Men in Black. She's just describing the plot of Men in Black.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:29.239
    | text      = And people think their costume is fabulous.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:32.239
    | text      = We can translate that also as, I don't understand cosplay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:35.239
    | text      = Noooo.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:36.239
    | text      = So yeah, you can go to Comic-Con and often you'll just see aliens who want to hang out.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:41.239
    | text      = And it's just like they're in a great costume.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:43.239
    | text      = Right. That's an amazing raptor costume.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:45.239
    | text      = It's definitely not that somebody spent painstaking hours crafting it as a labor of love that they're not really getting much for.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:53.239
    | text      = Except some of them have turned it into a gig.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:55.239
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:56.239
    | text      = But, come on. It's totally an alien.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:58.239
    | text      = Yeah, it's probably an alien.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:59.239
    | text      = Totally an alien.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:00.239
    | text      = It's totally an alien. Human beings, our technology has not advanced to the point where we can dress like that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:05.239
    | text      = No, we don't have paint.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:06.239
    | text      = No, only aliens can do that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:08.239
    | text      = Totally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:09.239
    | text      = And even the paint that we do have, harshly controlled by aliens because of the treaties.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:13.239
    | text      = Absolutely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:14.239
    | text      = That was the first thing you negotiate with aliens is a trade deal.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:17.239
    | text      = These treaties, by the way...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:19.239
    | text      = I learned that from The Phantom Menace.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:22.239
    | text      = These treaties are never dug into at all.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:26.239
    | text      = We don't get any real information about what went on in these treaties, what the stipulations were.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:32.239
    | text      = It's just, we got treaties.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:33.239
    | text      = That's my favorite part.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:34.239
    | text      = All of these treaties factor so heavily into all discussions about aliens from the Project Camelot stuff that I've heard.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:43.239
    | text      = Well, you know why?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:44.239
    | text      = Treaties are super important.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:46.239
    | text      = I can explain that to you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:48.239
    | text      = Any fantasy world requires rules.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:50.239
    | text      = That's true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:51.239
    | text      = Because there have to be rules in order to explain the really big stuff that you can't explain.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:56.239
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:57.239
    | text      = Like, why aren't raptors just talking to everybody? Oh, there's treaties.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:59.239
    | text      = Treaties.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:00.239
    | text      = It's the same thing with when you're trying, as I understand, I've never actually played Dungeons and Dragons.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:04.239
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:05.239
    | text      = But in order to create the fantasy scenario, you need that dungeon master making the rules of what is the reality of the campaign you're on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:13.239
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:14.239
    | text      = And basically, that's what Project Camelot does.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:16.239
    | text      = I want to play D&D with Project Camelot so bad.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:18.239
    | text      = But they're pretending it's real.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:20.239
    | text      = Can we play a D&D game where we pick characters from Project Camelot and roleplay as them?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:26.239
    | text      = Yes. A hundred percent.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:27.239
    | text      = All right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
